BlueMoonVineyard.Name: Blue Moon Vineyard
BlueMoonVineyard.Description: The Blue Moon Vineyard is a farm that specializes in the production of wine. Run by Sophia since the death of her parents.

CindersapForest.Name: Cindersap Forest
CindersapForest.Description: Contains Leah's Cottage, Marnie's Ranch, the Wizard's Tower, the Blue Moon Vineyard and Fairhaven Farm.  It is visted on Fridays and Sundays by a traveling cart which sells rare items.
